example.code:
PS C:\> Get-ACMCertificateList
CertificateArn DomainName -------------- ---------- arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:123456789012:certificate/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 www.example.com
example.description: Retrieves a list of all your certificate ARNs and the domain name for each. The cmdlet will automatically paginate to retrieve all the ARNs. To manually control pagination, use the -MaxItem parameter to control how many certificate ARNs are returned for each service call and the -NextToken parameter to indicate the starting point for each call.
Retrieves a list of all your certificate ARNs where the certificate status matches on the supplied states.
